parameters.name: RulesetId
parameters.description: The ID of the WAF ruleset, which can be obtained by calling the [ListWafRulesets](~~2878359~~) operation.

parameters.name: Shared
parameters.description: The configurations shared by multiple rules.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.
